reviewText:
It's funny to think how "new" Titanic seemed when it first came out, when you consider that films of this genre have been around since the 1930s.

This is a good example of that style. For those of you not in the know the boat the Mary Celeste disappeared after taking off from new york. Several weeks later it was found abandoned in the middle of the ocean.

No one knows what happened to it. This movie attempts to imagine what could have caused the passengers and crew to disapper and does so using a lot of action and suspense.

I won't ruin it for you but some of the crew members are evil.
